texto: Launched a 160+ member tech community by identifying unmet demand for hackathon participation and recruiting equally driven peers.
Spearheaded 12+ student-led events (hackathons, tech talks, networking), driving 13+ national recognitions and internship offers.
Designed the full visual identity and engineered the official website with Next.js + Tailwind, solidifying brand trust.
Secured university sponsorship by pitching to leadership, unlocking funding and representation in national-level events.
Grew brand reach to 100k+ impressions organically via targeted social media campaigns and storytelling content.
Mentored dozens of students on career navigation, contributing to international scholarships and tech job placements.
